title: Verify all IPL 2026 players visible in The Lab
description: Review IPL 2026 squads in The Lab and identify any missing players. Root cause identified: full_squad property name mismatch caused zero-player rendering. Fixed in commit e92c385.

domain_sanity.notes: All 10 teams x 231 players verified with correct properties in full squads

founder_validation.notes: Full squad property name fix confirmed. All players now visible in The Lab.
